original_title: Haier by Abans welcomes Tillakaratne Dilshan as Brand Ambassador
original_body_lines: Sri Lankan cricket legend and former Test Captain Tillakaratne Dilshan was appointed as the official brand ambassador of Haier Sri Lanka, brought by Abans PLC.

Founded in 1984, Haier is a leading global provider of better life and digital transformation solutions. Based on the purpose of “More Creation, More Possibilities”, the brand is committed to co-create infinite possibilities for a better life with global users, and to co-create infinite possibilities for industrial development with ecological partners. Recognised for its cutting-edge technology and sustainable practices, Haier has consistently topped global rankings, including being named the No.1 Global Major Appliances Brand for 14 consecutive years by Euromonitor International.

This appointment of a national icon like Dilshan further emphasises Haier’s commitment to integrating with the lifestyles and aspirations of Sri Lankan consumers, becoming the all-around partner for life.

With an illustrious career spanning almost 20 years, Tilakaratne Dilshan is commemorated within the hearts of Sri Lankans not only for his dynamic performance on the field as an expert all-rounder, but also for his innovation on the pitch, being the inventor of the iconic ‘Dilscoop’ shot. As a consistent winner in all formats of the game, Dilshan’s commitment to being resilient in the face of adversity and innovative moves perfectly aligns with Haier, a brand known worldwide for pushing boundaries of technology and giving the consumers the best.

Haier’s product range in Sri Lanka includes a variety of home appliances such as refrigerators, washing machine, ovens, air conditioners and many more, all designed with innovative features that caters to modern living. From energy-efficient technologies to AI-driven functionality, Haier products offer not just utility but an elevated experience of convenience and style.

Air Conditioners with features such as super anti-corrosion, as well as the ability to provide supersonic cooling in 10 seconds, Refrigerators that have convertible space, Expert Inverter technology, and stabiliser free operation, protecting your appliance against voltage fluctuations and expanding energy efficiency are some of the best home appliances that are offered by Haier.

Moreover, Haier also offers top-of-the-line technology with its washing machines, that are able to automatically detect the weight of the laundry, and implement electronic washing management, presenting you with the cleanest freshest your laundry has ever been. Haier chest freezers are able to retain their cool for over 100 hours without electricity, while keeping produce in two different temperatures in two different sections of the same chest freezer.
